title: 44,000 Riders, Zero Trains: A Case for the Geary Subway
description: A data-driven analysis (Python, D3.js) proving why the Geary corridor, with 44,000+ daily riders, is the most underserved transit route in San Francisco.

title: Visualizing Boston's Bike Share Network
description: This interactive map visualizes the Boston and Cambridge BlueBikes network, allowing users to explore how bike traffic volume and flow change throughout the day.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: Highlights the thin line between persuasive and deceptive visualizations by analyzing the relationship between race and police allegations.

title: The Relationship Between Calories and Recipe Rating
description:
A data-driven analysis exploring how calories impact average recipe ratings, using Python and
                      interactive plots.

title: Wave
description: A simple 2D game I developed during my junior year of high school.

title: pokemon.js
description: A Node.js module that makes interacting with Pok√©API easier.
